entry.title: Hiatus is Over!
entry.summary: This blog has been on a long (and heretofore unannounced) hiatus as I completed my Ph.D. dissertation over the summer. But good news! Now that my dissertation has been defended, I'm ready to start posting again. Regular updates will resume soon.
entry.content: This blog has been on a long (and heretofore unannounced) hiatus as I completed my Ph.D. dissertation over the summer. But good news! Now that my dissertation has been defended, I'm ready to start posting again. Regular updates will resume soon.
